title: nacl: support mmap
body:
GOOS=nacl seems to implement `runtimeÂ·mmap` in terms of `NACL_SYSCALL(SYS_mmap)`, but not expose a `syscall.Mmap` (or `golang.org/x/sys/unix#Mmap`). It'd be great to be able to use mmap even from a sandboxed process.

Use case: https://github.com/boltdb/bolt/issues/571
